casebody.data:
In the Matter of Peter POULOS and Peter Millionas Trading as NEW YORK CELERY COMPANY, Bankrupts. Irving Trust Company, as Trustee, Appellant. No. 237. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Feb. 1, 1932. Ward & Palzer, of New York City (Nathaniel J. Palzer and Michael S. Gleason, -both of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Morris Kohn, of New York City, for bankrupt. *

Before MANTON, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order, 53 F.(2d) 385, affirmed on the authority of Willis v. Hart, 11 F.(2d) 530 (C. C. A. 5).
